channel.title: Log in 99hp change to 60 str 60 hp

item.title: Log in 99hp change to 60 str 60 hp
item.dc:creator: @Problem Problem
item.description:
@Problem wrote:

Try this :

for (int i=0; i<playerLevel.length; i++) { //Setting Levels if (i == 3) { playerLevel[i] = 60; playerXP[i] = 300000; } else { playerLevel[i] = 1; playerXP[i] = 0; } } if (i == 3) { playerLevel[i] = 60; playerXP[i] = 300000; } else { playerLevel[i] = 1; playerXP[i] = 0; } }

item.title: Log in 99hp change to 60 str 60 hp
item.dc:creator: @IfearI IfearI
item.description:
@IfearI wrote:

Hey, Im new to coding and maybe can some1 explain me what this mean?
(can you explain me: i++, i=0 ,…etc)

(it gives me 60hp)

[code]

	for (int i=0; i<playerLevel.length; i++) { //Setting Levels
		if (i == 3) {
			playerLevel[i] = 60;
			playerXP[i] = 300000;
		} else {
			playerLevel[i] = 1;
			playerXP[i] = 0;
		}
                          }[/code]

I tought if i change it to this (under this sentence)
it will make me have 60 str and hp if i log in put it only give me 60 str

for (int i=0; i<playerLevel.length; i++) { //Setting Levels if (i == 3) { playerLevel[i] = 60; playerXP[i] = 300000; } else { playerLevel[i] = 1; playerXP[i] = 0; } if (i == 2) { playerLevel[i] = 60; playerXP[i] = 300000; } else { playerLevel[i] = 1; playerXP[i] = 0; } }

I just wanne make it so when a new player logs in he have 60str and 60hp and 60 mage.

I’l need to do this on a other way or change some stuff in this code above?
(the code is in Player.java)

P.S. Is this not a good title?
